Name: Terra
Details:
Terra is the homeworld of humanity. Although Terra orbits a star named Sol, the star system is usually called the Terra system because of the planet's importance.

Terra was the capital of the Terran Alliance and the Terran Hegemony that followed it. It was also the seat of government for the Star League until House Cameron fell in the Amaris Coup.

Since 2788, ComStar has administered Terra as a neutral world.
